/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image presents a panoramic view of a street in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a low angle, looking up towards the sky, giving a sense of grandeur to the scene. The street is lined with lush green trees on both sides, their leaves forming a canopy that filters the sunlight. The sky above is a clear blue, with a few clouds scattered across it. On the right side of the street, there's a building with a distinctive red roof, adding a pop of color to the scene. The image appears to have been taken during the day, as evidenced by the bright and vibrant colors.
